Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
1:13PM - Snow Bowl Express and Ursa Express are open for summit access! Mechanics are actively working on de icing the rest of the scheduled lifts.

1/26 5:51AM - POWDER ALERT! A 9 inch blanket of powder has covered all 99 trails with an additional 1-3 inches possible during the day. You read that right, we are anticipating to be 100% open on this powder Monday as patrol heads out to assess terrain, and we couldnt be more stoked! While weather reports called for more snowfall, Mother Nature still did not disappoint, giving us the best conditions we've seen all year! So strap in, buckle up, call out of work, or do whatever you got to do to get in on this!

The grooming team was up and out early laying fresh corduroy on 51 trails. For your way up, 10 lifts are scheduled to spin at 9AM with the possibility of wind and weather related delays. Temperatures have risen to a comfortable 17-21 degrees at the base and 9-13 degrees up top. 

If youre traveling to or from the mountain today, please drive safely and use extra caution, as winter conditions and changing weather will impact road conditions.

Today's shaping up to be one you wont want to miss. Let's get it!

Safety Tip: Always ski or ride with a friend in the glades.

The Ikon Stoke Event is back this weekend from Friday, January 30 through Sunday, February 1. There will be plenty of giveaways, music, aprs, and even early lift access for Ikon Pass holders. Plus, you can enter to win a 26/27 Ikon Pass to keep the stoke rolling into next season! See you there!

For a limited time, Ikon Pass and Ikon Base Pass holders can share 50% off a regular-price lift ticket with their friends and family. Purchase before February 13 to claim the discount for a ticket that can be used any day of the season! Click here to learn more!

Lift tickets are now up to 50% off on Wednesdays and Thursdays! Book now and save big!

Snowboard Week is here and we're excited to offer $49 adult group snowboard lessons through January 31 to celebrate our snowboarding roots. Book now while availability lasts!

Discover the thrill of skiing or snowboarding with Stratton Mountain's Learn to Ski or Ride Program. This step-by-step program is designed to help you master the slopesand reward you with a 25/26 Stratton Select Pass, to ride out the rest of the season, upon completion.

Looking to progress this season? Strattons Camps and Clinics offer targeted skill development, expert coaching, and a strong sense of community for skiers and snowboarders. From womens programs to freestyle, snowboard, and advanced clinics, each offers a supportive, goal-focused environment to help you make the most of the season, with programs offered all throughout the winter. 

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability!

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.
